product.title: NEXPURE Hair Dryer and Blow Dryer Brush in One, New Upgrade 4 in 1 Hair Dryer Brush with Negative Ion Anti-frizz Ceramic Titanium Barrel
product.description:
New upgrade NEXPURE 4 in 1 Hot Air Brush - You are the Next Pure Beauty!

Brand Name: NEXPURE

Item Condition: New Upgrade

Rating Power: 1300W 

Rating Voltage: AC 125V 60Hz

Heat Settings: Cool/Warm/Hot

Item Size: 1.57×1.57×12.99in / Package Size:5.51×3.74×16.14in

Item Weight: 1.05lbs / Packaging Weight:1.97lbs

Package Include: 1 x Hair Dryer Brush, 1 x Warranty Card, 1 x Instruction Manual,1 x Exquisite Gift Box

Warranty & Service Our products come with 1-year-free warranty. If any issues, please contact our customer service team, we will reply you within 24 hours.

product.description_full:
New upgrade NEXPURE 4 in 1 Hot Air Brush - You are the Next Pure Beauty!

Brand Name: NEXPURE

Item Condition: New Upgrade

Rating Power: 1300W 

Rating Voltage: AC 125V 60Hz

Heat Settings: Cool/Warm/Hot

Item Size: 1.57×1.57×12.99in / Package Size:5.51×3.74×16.14in

Item Weight: 1.05lbs / Packaging Weight:1.97lbs

Package Include: 1 x Hair Dryer Brush, 1 x Warranty Card, 1 x Instruction Manual,1 x Exquisite Gift Box

Warranty & Service Our products come with 1-year-free warranty. If any issues, please contact our customer service team, we will reply you within 24 hours. * PROFESSIONAL 1-STEP HAIR STYLE: The Hair Dryer Brush is a 4-in-1 styling tool that combines a blow dryer, styler, straightener and curler to simplify your hair care routine. It dries and styles hair simultaneously, offering smooth, voluminous, and frizz-free results with ease.
   
 * NEGATIVE ION TECHNOLOGY & CERAMIC COATING：The hot air brush features an oval-shaped ceramic barrel, distributing heat evenly to minimize damage. Negative ions quickly penetrate the hair to help lock in moisture, nourish hair, and reduce frizz and static.Ceramic coating and negative ions work together to better protect your hair while styling.
 * 360° AIRFLOW & 3 SPEEDS:The unique oval barrel features 360° airflow that evenly distributes negative ions to help smooth hair, while the rounded edges add volume and shape your hair. Designed with nylon pin and tufted bristles, they prevent tangles and add volume and shine.And It has 3 temperatures and 2 wind speeds, you can customize it according to your habits and needs.
 * NEW UPGRADED PREMIUM GREY METALLIC PAINT COATING:The hot comb is coated with a smooth gray metallic paint, which not only enhances its durability but also provides a smooth, premium feel. This high-quality coating is scratch-resistant and anti-fingerprint, ensuring long-term use while maintaining its flawless appearance. The exquisite gray-purple hue adds an elegant touch and complements a variety of bathroom decor styles, creating a sophisticated, modern aesthetic.
 * EXQUISITE GIFT BOX:NEXPURE hair dryer brush comes in an elegant, beautifully designed gift box, making it the perfect gift for family and friends. This premium packaging is carefully crafted to elevate your gift-giving experience, adding a touch of luxury and ensuring your gift leaves a lasting impression. Whether it's a holiday or a special occasion, NEXPURE offers stylish, premium gift options.

  • PROFESSIONAL 1-STEP HAIR STYLE: The Hair Dryer Brush is a 4-in-1 styling tool that combines a blow dryer, styler, straightener and curler to simplify your hair care routine. It dries and styles hair simultaneously, offering smooth, voluminous, and frizz-free results with ease.
  • NEGATIVE ION TECHNOLOGY & CERAMIC COATING：The hot air brush features an oval-shaped ceramic barrel, distributing heat evenly to minimize damage. Negative ions quickly penetrate the hair to help lock in moisture, nourish  hair, and reduce frizz and static.Ceramic coating and negative ions work together to better protect your hair while styling.
  • 360° AIRFLOW & 3 SPEEDS: The unique oval barrel features 360° airflow that evenly distributes negative ions to help smooth hair, while the rounded edges add volume and shape your hair. Designed with nylon pin and tufted bristles, they prevent tangles and add volume and shine.And It has 3 temperatures and 2 wind speeds, you can customize it according to your habits and needs.

The exquisite gray-purple hue adds an elegant touch and complements a variety of bathroom decor styles, creating a sophisticated, modern aesthetic.

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
